Meet our Admins

  • Soumyajit Bag: Our Website Developer. Thanks to him for making this website a reality from dream.

  • Progun Ghose: Youngest Admin of this page. Helped to add up to date & correct data about many rakes. We're thankful to him for his dedicated work.

  • Aritra Bhaumik: This website is inspired by his work of sorting all the rakes of Sealdah (North & South) Division. Actively involved in providing up to date data and information.

  • Kaushik Sengupta: Thanks to this person for making a huge platform for all the Railfans. It's our great pleasure to have him as an Admin of our page.

  • Atanu Roy: Our Website Designer. This website is the result of his idea. Actively engaged in providing data and innovative ideas to make this website more enriched.
